meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Seth Madej Rich Steeves Ragavan Ramsubramani Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7525.

td.p: Seth Madej, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Rich Steeves, a manager of commercial support content from Norwalk, Connecticut
Ragavan Ramsubramani, a financial analyst from New York, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $41,602)

tr.td: A MARBLE-OUS CATEGORY
RECIPE ORIGINS
LITERATURE
SECRETARIES OF STATE
CREATURES IN MOVIE TITLES
2 OUT OF 3 AIN'T "BAD"
(Alex: Each response will be 3 words. One of those words will be "bad." The other two ain't.)
